category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: METimeSystemSearchResultFields
preference.preference_description: Specifies the time system fields that are displayed in the search result when performing a TiCon search in Manufacturing Process Planner. You can group the fields in different configurations. Valid Values: One or more strings. Each string must have the following format: configuration:field_1;width_1,field_2;width_2,...field_n;width_n field_x represents the time system field and width_x specifies the initial width of the field_x column in the search result table. If you leave the configuration value empty, the field appears in the default configuration.
